tns:Object.name: meta
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE META (VERSION INT NOT NULL)

tns:Object.name: tablespaces
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE TABLESPACES ( SPACE_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, SPACE_NAME VARCHAR2(128) NOT NULL UNIQUE, SPACE_HANDLER VARCHAR2(1024) DEFAULT 'HDFS', SPACE_URI VARCHAR2(4000) NOT NULL )

tns:Object.name: TABLESPACES_SEQ
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE SEQUENCE TABLESPACES_SEQ

tns:Object.name: TABLESPACES_AUTOINC
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER TABLESPACES_AUTOINC BEFORE INSERT ON TABLESPACES FOR EACH ROW WHEN (new.SPACE_ID IS NULL) BEGIN SELECT TABLESPACES_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :new.SPACE_ID FROM DUAL; END;

tns:Object.name: DATABASES_
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE DATABASES_ ( DB_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, DB_NAME VARCHAR2(128) NOT NULL UNIQUE, SPACE_ID INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (SPACE_ID) REFERENCES TABLESPACES (SPACE_ID) )

tns:Object.name: DATABASES__SEQ
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE SEQUENCE DATABASES__SEQ

tns:Object.name: DATABASES__AUTOINC
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER DATABASES__AUTOINC BEFORE INSERT ON DATABASES_ FOR EACH ROW WHEN (new.DB_ID IS NULL) BEGIN SELECT DATABASES__SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :new.DB_ID FROM DUAL; END;

tns:Object.name: TABLES
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE TABLES ( TID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, DB_ID INT NOT NULL, TABLE_NAME VARCHAR2(128) NOT NULL, TABLE_TYPE VARCHAR2(128) NOT NULL, PATH VARCHAR2(4000), STORE_TYPE CHAR(16), FOREIGN KEY (DB_ID) REFERENCES DATABASES_ (DB_ID) )

tns:Object.name: TABLES_SEQ
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE SEQUENCE TABLES_SEQ

tns:Object.name: TABLES_AUTOINC
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER TABLES_AUTOINC BEFORE INSERT ON TABLES FOR EACH ROW WHEN (new.TID IS NULL) BEGIN SELECT TABLES_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :new.TID FROM DUAL; END;

tns:Object.name: TABLES_IDX_DB_ID
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE INDEX TABLES_IDX_DB_ID on TABLES (DB_ID)

tns:Object.name: TABLES_IDX_TABLE_ID
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX TABLES_IDX_TABLE_ID on TABLES (DB_ID, TABLE_NAME)

tns:Object.name: COLUMNS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE COLUMNS ( TID INT NOT NULL, COLUMN_NAME VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, ORDINAL_POSITION INT NOT NULL, NESTED_FIELD_NUM INT NOT NULL, DATA_TYPE CHAR(16), TYPE_LENGTH INTEGER, CONSTRAINT COLUMNS_PKEY PRIMARY KEY (TID, ORDINAL_POSITION), FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: OPTIONS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE OPTIONS ( TID INT NOT NULL, KEY_ VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, VALUE_ VARCHAR2(4000) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT OPTIONS_PKEY PRIMARY KEY (TID, KEY_), FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: INDEXES
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE INDEXES ( DB_ID INT NOT NULL, TID INT NOT NULL, INDEX_NAME VARCHAR2(128) NOT NULL, COLUMN_NAME VARCHAR2(128) NOT NULL, DATA_TYPE VARCHAR2(128) NOT NULL, INDEX_TYPE CHAR(32) NOT NULL, IS_UNIQUE CHAR NOT NULL, IS_CLUSTERED CHAR NOT NULL, IS_ASCENDING CHAR NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT INDEXES_PKEY PRIMARY KEY (DB_ID, INDEX_NAME), FOREIGN KEY (DB_ID) REFERENCES DATABASES_ (DB_ID) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: INDEXES_IDX_TID_COLUMN_NAME
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE INDEX INDEXES_IDX_TID_COLUMN_NAME on INDEXES (TID, COLUMN_NAME)

tns:Object.name: STATS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE STATS ( TID INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, NUM_ROWS NUMBER(38), NUM_BYTES NUMBER(38), FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: PARTITION_METHODS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE PARTITION_METHODS ( TID INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, PARTITION_TYPE VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, EXPRESSION VARCHAR2(1024) NOT NULL, EXPRESSION_SCHEMA RAW(1024) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: PARTITIONS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE PARTITIONS ( PARTITION_ID INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, TID INT NOT NULL, PARTITION_NAME VARCHAR2(767), PATH VARCHAR2(4000), FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: PARTITIONS_SEQ
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE SEQUENCE PARTITIONS_SEQ

tns:Object.name: PARTITIONS_AUTOINC
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER PARTITIONS_AUTOINC BEFORE INSERT ON PARTITIONS FOR EACH ROW WHEN (new.PARTITION_ID IS NULL) BEGIN SELECT PARTITIONS_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :new.PARTITION_ID FROM DUAL; END;

tns:Object.name: PARTITION_KEYS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE PARTITION_KEYS ( PARTITION_ID INT NOT NULL, COLUMN_NAME VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, PARTITION_VALUE VARCHAR(255) NULL, FOREIGN KEY (PARTITION_ID) REFERENCES PARTITIONS (PARTITION_ID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: PARTITION_KEYS_IDX
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE INDEX PARTITION_KEYS_IDX on PARTITION_KEYS (PARTITION_ID, COLUMN_NAME, PARTITION_VALUE)
